label: generate_multiplication_table
peekOfCode:
def generate_multiplication_table(n):
    print(n,"x 1 =",n*1)
    print(n,"x 1 =",n*2)
    print(n,"x 1 =",n*3)
    print(n,"x 1 =",n*4)
    print(n,"x 1 =",n*5)
    print(n,"x 1 =",n*6)
    print(n,"x 1 =",n*7)
    print(n,"x 1 =",n*8)
    print(n,"x 1 =",n*9)
